DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , randomize , placebo-controlled , double-blind , Phase II study . The objective study evaluate efficacy safety 12 week treatment CJC-1134-PC patient currently metformin monotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety CJC-1134-PC Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Who Are Currently Metformin Monotherapy
DOC.criteria: Major BMI : 27 45 kg/m2 Stable Type 2 diabetes mellitus least 3 month , define Investigator Stable lifestyle , i.e . diet & physical activity , determine Investigator Stable metformin daily dose ≥1000 mg least 3 month Glycosylated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) screen ≥ 7.1 % ≤ 11 %
